Contenido: im not sure where to start with cyberpunk 2077 this game many problems starting with bugs and optimization to gameplay and story building keep in mind when reading this i had lower expectations than most with this game but still believed it would have been good game just not as good as everyone was hyping it up to be when first beginning my adventure into cyberpunk i walk outside the starting car to 2 different groups of thugs floating on top of each others heads given that was on the first day of release i dont mind too much considering every game these days are released with butt load of bugs and eventually problems like this will be fixed not only did i find these thugs floating as soon as i exited the door npcs are clipping through elevators doors and walls while talking with and getting to their destination optimization is also complaint for many i dont understand why the recommended specs for this game involve 1060 matter what graphics settings i change the game still nearly the same performance but again this is common in many games so im not going to fault cyberpunk specifically for this problem just something i wish many games would resolve that being said i have 1080 and an i7 7700k and only getting max of 60fps when playing on medium settings only about 5 fps more than playing with everything set to max speaking of graphics this game doesnt seem to be special in any regard with their graphics and i actually recommend you check out this video httpswwwyoutubecomwatchv4dwtwbpxzv8 to see the differences between ultra and low sometimes it seems as though lower is better just to reduce the amount of blur they use when on ultra and it seems as though there is real significant difference when playing on one or the other i thought amazing atmosphere and breathtaking visuals was something cyberpunk was striving to get but these visuals are simply not impressive they arent bad either but after taking break from the game i went off to red dead redemption 2 and man the difference was night and day graphically speaking onto the gameplay at the very beginning aside from the bugs i was roped in the story was really nice and the graphics seemed impressive at that point but once you get 2 hours in you walk out of your apartment ready to take on the world the atmosphere here is fantastic i felt like little boy in the middle of huge open world hopped in my car and drove around with nearly nothing to do i figured well it is the beginning i was just introduced to the world ill do few more missions and see what more opens up i meet new people get more mechanics thrown at and at that point it changed nearly nothing just more upgrades and neat gadgets to do things with that were niche at best hacking only gives you 3 options after beginning the game attack distract or take over take over cameras hack into people and damage them or activate light tv or forklift to distract the enemy it is nearly useless to use these mechanics unless you want to distract the exact same copy pasted bulletsponges not to mention when you hack someone and blow up their phone or cyberware and damage them they do not bat an eye unless you actually see you you can hack wait minute hack again until they are dead this right here i thought was bit embarrassing they dont even try to walk around and find you its similar to skyrim npcs getting hit with an arrow and believing it was their imagination once i even had civilian drive near turf shootout and sit there staring at us shooting instead of panicking driving off she sat there because my car was stuck in the way in front of tens of guys shooting near her i truly feel like gta v npcs were more impressive and that game came out in 2013 there are also cyberpsychos who were really hyped up in the first side mission to be cool diverse murdering cops and innocents then retreating into their little cave but i quickly found out after fighting 3 of them they are exactly the same and even the ai here is bit wacky you fire an entire magazine into them and they magically dodge half the bullets that are being fired straight into them their ai is also only programmed to stay in one specific spot if you get out of their fight zone theyll stand there and let you keep firing or hack to your hearts contentfinally the story i thought the very introduction was really interesting at first as i said it roped in gave the characters some personality and hyped up for really nice solo experience until i finished the introduction and found my way into nightcity once i awoke and started my adventure it just felt like chore im sitting with someone talking about job who tells to get in car and talk with someone about job i then murder for said object then sit with someone and talk about job granted im only 4ish hours into the story but so far i just cant tell whats happening and i just dont seem to care about whats happening its just job to job and for some reason the big boss giving out jobs cares about specifically for real reason when confronted with the question just says im more trustworthy when i just met the guy the only praise i can say with this story is within these fetch quests is the ministories there are really cool and dont seem super scripted it felt really interactive when choosing my dialogue then something would happen and im slowly regretting that decision but on the decision side of things i suppose this could be slight spoiler so beware everyone gets their own introduction when playing but after the intro everyone is put into the exact same spot so not every experience seems like it will be tailored into your own unique storyfinishing this review off i just want to say that cyberpunk 2077 really the atmosphere and world building for great game but because the gameplay and story lacks so much i dont know what this game could become the open world really seems nearly dead with every side quest seeming to be exactly the same with random punks wanting to kill you for scraps there is so much left to be desired with this game and the gameplay is nothing shy of b tier ubisoft game truly it feels like watchdogsthe division but i suppose thats giving it some praise because at least watchdogs had really cool unique things with their hacks but pretty much thats about what i have to say thank you to anyone for reading i do not recommend this game in its current state and it seems like it would take quite bit of time for the game to really be something special though in the end i am happy the team hopefully gets small break after being in crunch mode for over year ill definitely give this game another shot over time and update my review accordingly since i want this to be as accurate as it can be

Contenido: this review pains to write as i really loved the game and wished to enjoy my time with it unfortunately there are many short comings to this game at its current state that i just can not give good review for major spoiler warning aheadmy opinions without spoilers will be at the tldr section at the bottomlets first get this out of the way the map design and visuals are gorgeous my first steps into leyndll capital and the stunning nokron and nokstella cities gave feeling ive never felt in any of the hundreds of the games ive played this is doubt the most immersive and enjoyable world fromsoftware ever madethe amount of content in this game is also unfathomable the amount of details and secrets such as the hidden sellia tunnel or the countless talismans and quests made eager to explore every nook and cranny of this worldthe sound design is also stellar not only are the boss soundtracks absolutely enjoyable my favorite without doubt is the tibia mariners theme but the sound design in general is mesmerizing the latin chants of the manbats or the cries of the cowmans to name few are hypnotic to say the least however there are many shortcomings to this state that made my experience unenjoyablelets first talk optimization as i feel this applies to the most amount of users the optimization at the games current state is simply horrendous per my experience the game could rarely run smoothly at 60fps with the lowest settings on my gtx 1070ti with 16gb ram and i78700 im also encountering framedrops or frameskipping in every boss fight granted these are not the best specs but they are at least better or at onpar with average graphic cards these days friend of mine who 3080 and i9 core could rarely achieve great frame rates at high settings and others who had poorer specs could barely run the game at allofcourse turning the resolution down and altering graphics files could net an increase in frame rates but players shouldnt be forced to juggle nay choose between immersiveness and playabilitynext is the boss designs dont get wrong lots of the boss designs are incredibly amazing and interesting especially true of the demigods however this only lasts for the earlymid portion of the game many of the minibosses are overrecycled and most bosses just become war of attrition or worse luck i understand that this is huge openworld game and there are limited resources for development but when you are fighting your 7th ulcerated tree spirit or 6th erdtree avatar the encounters themselves simply feel unrewarding and boring i am also particularly disappointed with the reuse of the naturalborn of the void the main appeal of this lovecraftian scorpion is that its supposed to be onetime encounter with being that should not exist in the game world it should be horrifying and provide only hint of what could exist in order to create lingering dread and fear in the players however when it is reused again in simple icecave it just destroys the whole experience at least for methe bosses are also extremely unbalanced i know i know git gud just dodge bro but it feels like this title heavily caters towards sorcerers and abusing summons for the early game the game doesnt expect you to have good spells good stats or good summons and so the bosses feel fair and closerange attacks feels powerful this is flipped completely in the later portion for my playthrough i was using hybrid int build i could simply summon 10 oleg knight have it tank all the damage and spam fullmoons until whatever is infront of is obliterated this made the game uninteresting and so i switched to strengthfaith build and i can say that it was completely hell on earth it feels as through all of the boss attacks are targeted towards meleeplayers the magma wyrm attacks astel voidborn aoes and many other attacks is nonthreatening to ranged users and lethal to melee users because of the summons the rests between each attack from bosses are cut extremely short compared to other souls games as they expect you to be playing essentially 2 on 1 or 2 on 2 this created dilemma in which playing without summons and melee builds is extremely challenging while playing with summons as sorcerer is extremely unfun and repetitivealso most bosses are not challenging by design but are simply scaled up to one shot you if you dont dodge random bs ability 476 like ffs why does the black knife ring leader have like 500million health while being able to track and one shot you with his jump aoesid like to bring up sekiro in comparison sekiro did the gameplay system perfectly at least imo where the boss attacks dont feel random but is challenge of skills if you fail to parry thats on you if you fail to recognize the chain combos thats on you if you parry everything you get an opportunity to retaliate or heal in eldenring its not the same lets say you get hit by ability you are now faced with two decisions heal or not heal due to the short times between attacks it is essentially gambit random roll of dice of whether you get punished for healing or not this is as i mentioned because summons exist and so the game is balanced to the summonsthe fights themselves turn into battle of attrition of whoever runs out of health or flasks first and whoever is the luckiest instead of true dance and true combat of skillquestslastly the quest system is also abominable it is unwelcoming to veteran souls players and completely confusing to new players considering this very well could be the first souls game or even the first ever game that someone plays though i did enjoy doing some quests and feeling like satisfied after linking the dots between questlines how on earth are you supposed to progress main quest lines such as seluvis plot without looking up guide to find hidden tunnel in the billions of ruins or how do you know without exploring for hundreds of hours where brother corhyn went after just simply left the roundtable without even hint of where hes headingofcourse the games not supposed to let you know everything but at least give slight hint or direction you explore and finish the entire game without completing single questline even when you are ecstatic to do sotldrthe game is immersive and interesting with jawdropping visuals and some unique mechanics however due to the atrocious optimization poor balancing and perplexing quest system i simply can not recommend it at its current statei emphasize at its current state because i wish that most of the complaints will be addressed and i would love to absolutely adore this game however it is sadly not the case right nowthat said im going to be playing more eldenring because despite my complaints it is pretty fun
AspectosPositivos: ['Map design', 'Visuals', 'Amount of content', 'Sound design']
AspectosNegativos: ['Optimization', 'Boss designs', 'Boss balance', 'Quest system']

Contenido: tldr dont buy its unfinished and simply not what was promised i personally enjoyed it thoalso review is based on my experience with the game in 2020early 2021general thoughtsfirst off i enjoyed my 50 hours with cyberpunk so fari encountered small amount of bugs which were mostly funny or dumb in nature or minor annoyance at moststill under circumstances do i wan na overlook the horrendous state the game wasstill is in on other platformshardwarein my opinion the game should have never been announced for lastgen consolesalso the implementation of rtx appears to have made huge impact on development the game is poorly optimized doubtlets dig bit deeperperformancegraphicsi run 3070 and ryzen 5600x at the moment decent hardware one could say still on ultra settings 1080p i get measly 70fps average city center dips to the 50fps range occasionally not bad but still disappointingthe game changer here really is dlss turn this setting to quality or performance further everything beyond performance is gon na look like cereal dlss boosts my fps by about 40 on average which is impressiverendering and texture streaming seem to have been heavily gutted to make the game run on the old console generation which is sad to see i often encountered missing textures or textures that were low quality popping in suddenly becoming hdand these are just few of the visual bugs i encounterednow i can look past that mostly but it still leaves that feeling of oh god i wasted money on thison the other hand the game is simply stunning visuals and textures are solid across the board lighting even without rtx on is really nice the game creates lot of atmosphere just with the visuals alonethere is so much attention to detail in everything the cars the different city districts the houses the advertisements etc etc etccharacter models are beautifully done dont get started i think panam rogue judy kerry etc are some of the most convincing and beautiful character models ive ever seenthe main characters are total feast for the eyes they are truly sight to behold and make playing the sidequests so much more worth itaudiosound designvoice actingi had some big issues with the audiothe biggest problem is that some parts of environmental audio just keep cutting in and out randomlythere are cutscenes in which you only hear your character grunting despite being in fight while beating someone to the ground it gets extremely awkward at timesalso people will deliver some sentences with completely different cadence with completely different voice filtersetup as if rerecordedand those moments arent far and inbetween it happens all the timevoice acting is well done for the most parteven pedestrian oneliners sound believableespecially for the main characters their voices carry lot of well character hahexcept for the two most important charactershow could they this upfirst off vive only played female v so far but its been really disappointing and even cringe at some pointsv just sounds so disinterested at best v manages to sound cynical and edgy maybe sarcastic the rest is some mix of neutral and tired its really weird the female voice actor sounds like purposefully lowering their tone to sound toughi hate itsecondly johnny silverhandits less bad than on v i like keanu reeves as an actor and i adore lot of the roles playedi think johnnys voice acting is okayish for the most part but theres little character in it there are situations in which johnny just sounds so outof placehave listen to some of johnnys voicelines during tense moments and youll agree with meit feels like the actors for v johnny and some others very occasionally havent been properly introduced to the scene theyre playingthis only gets amplified by the audio bugs i mentioned aboveit really hurtsthe music ingame is some of the best and most emotionally impactful ive heard in any gameit is simply amazing give listen to bells of laguna bend or outsider morethe score beautifully underlines the important story moments and perfectly builds tension where it is neededradio music and fighting ambience are okay but become stale quickly nothing special heregameplaygameplay is i dunno alrightmost side quests are the usual fetchkillbring and deliver add all the other stuff one would expect from an openworld rpgadventurestory and sidequests are done nicely i enjoyed all of the meaningful quests thouroughlygunplay feels nice the melee weapons are okay but kinda obsoleteperks do basically next to nothing for you for being advertised as an rpg the skill trees feature next to new abilities only percentual bonuses to stats you or your weapons might haveapart from quickhacking and stealth the perks have little impact on how you playthe most impactful upgrades are the cyberneticsthe whole skill system feels like rushed afterthoughtbugs here are limited to certain quest triggers not happening forcing you to reload save filenot too bad i havent had any quests hardlock my game yetnpcs are laughable apart from the usual shopkeepers and vendors or questrelated npcs the pedestrians are totally replaceableall they can do is walk around cower in fear run away or drive straight its honestly impressive how much cdpr was able to contradict their own promisesi mean the npcs literally disappear when you walk block daily routine my assi wouldve loved more clothing and weapon variety there are probably only 15 weapons in the game varying in stats and paint finish if at all clothing is bit better but it still sucked to walk into store look at the sleek designs on the walladverts and not being able to buy anything shown in the advertsstorythe story is nicely done in my opinionits nothing praiseworthy intense heartwrenching drama gigantic plottwistsbut the story and dilemma of v creates lots of stuff to think and talk aboutthe notion of self gets questioned family death afterlife and personal growth play big roles theres criticism on basically any modern way of living everywhere but cdpr managed to not overdo it to the point of sjwismi wont go into much detail here but i enjoyed the story extended through sidequests lotconclusioncyberpunk 2077 is guilty pleasuremaybe i am easy to impress but if i can find one or two things that make game interesting for its worth playing and liking to the characters story and love to detail really saved this game in my eyesthere are glaring issues that will definitely ruin the experience for many playersbut to face the facts this game isnt recommendableat this point january 2021 it doesnt come close to aaa experiencecdpr promised to redo big parts of the game until june 21 so maybe get the game then

AspectosNegativos: ['Unfinished state of the game', 'Poor optimization', 'Audio issues', 'Limited impact of perks in gameplay', 'Limited clothing and weapon variety']

Contenido: simply disappointed the witcher 3 is one of my favorite games of all time the story the characters the open world all memorable engaging and interesting safe to say my expectations for cyberpunk 2077 were high i didnt expect it to be better than the witcher 3 but i did think it would be the next game that you could remember for long time spoiler it is not lets start with something positive though the game is gorgeous i played on rtx 3080 and amd 5900x with ray tracing set to maximum settings with fully ray traced global illumination interiors are probably the best i have ever seen and the outside areas are simply stunning as well the world is reflecting in small water puddles after it rained and shadows are cast through the skyscrapers to the lower streets while the open world looks beautiful though its all façade it doesnt feel real let explain npcs simply walk up and down street and do not interact with you at all gta v which came out in 2013 way more immersive open world gta also actually good police chases or should i say it even police chases when you kill an npc in cyberpunk you can gets stars just like in gta but the police will not chase you nooo if they are close to you they will just try to kill you on sight simply drive away 200m and they forgot with setting like cyberpunk you could have had drones chasing you or even just police cars but none of that exists another thing i noticed is that i cant remember anything from the open world you could show picture from part of the world in gta the witcher 3 or red dead redemption 2 and i could tell you where that is here it all feels the same real landmarks nothing memorableok the world looks beautiful but it doesnt feel immersive at all what about the storysimply said its alright completely forgettable after one play through the characters for the most part are boring and wont be remembered very long the three background stories you can select at the start are meaningless and offer nothing more than few dialogue options in your playthrough its huge missed opportunity and it doesnt help that you dont get much if any background on v you simply want to become legend in night city for whatever reason one strong suit are the side quests though they are the most interesting part of the game you can engage in variety of activities with lots of easter eggs and often fun dialogue select amount of larger side quests tie into the games ending but in very unnatural way if you completed the side quests you are offered an additional option in the final quest there could have been more elegant solutions but its passable all in all the story is the part that disappointed most the witcher 3 had masterful story and i expected something similar but what we got is honestly on the same level as watch dogs alright passable you wont remember itbut wait there is more gameplaythought getting calls in gta was annoying well youre in luck you are getting called all the time it is bad really bad ive also had countless occasions where i was in dialogue in the main story and got call from side quest like wtf both dialogues overlap at that point and the already broken immersion is completely ruined with that out of the way the actual gameplay is alright shooting is passable but wont win any prizes melee combat is straight garbage hacking seems completely useless and i never really utilized it that is because the ai is just not good they cant adapt to you quick enough most of the time just standing in the open and shooting at you as i said before look at gta v not to mention red dead redemption 2 or even the witcher 3 the ai there was better if you buy the double jump cyberware upgrade the game breaks btw and the ai is overwhelmed by the positions you can reach character customization is also flat out bad if you go for the best armor stats you look like clown make clothing exclusively visual or look at literally any other game that released in the last years to see how to make system where you have clothing stats but can still choose your style as you want itcrafting frankly its not obtainable when you play the story to upgrade to legendary quality items you need to spend 18 points into the crafting skill tree which is just bad decision to make while playing but even after youve done that the required amount of materials are ridiculously expensive and probably wont be possible to obtain for large number of players the leaves the skill tree and the inventory system the prior is good you get tons of options to skill to your preferred play style and i feel like the skills are impactful for the most part the inventory system is unfortunately copied from the witcher 3 its not great the weight on items and the weight limit on your inventory is annoying and doesnt add anything to the game ive gotten to this part and have not even mentioned bugs much but they cant be ignored the game is in disastrous state on release you cant get through single quest without having three animations completely break sounds missing and sometimes trigger just refuses to work entirely the performance is also not good and even with my setup the game only uses 40 of the gpu which just shows its not very well optimized or programmed so can i recommend it not right now if you expect the next huge game that will be talked about for long time because of the story you will be hugely disappointed if you look for good rpg you will be disappointed if you look for good firstperson shooter you will be disappointed if you look for good open world game you will be disappointed if you look for the probably bestlooking open world game that takes place in large city though then this might be just right for you but even if thats what you want wait the game is in an awful technical state and i would not recommend buying it right now if you are not 100 sure you have setup that can run the game somewhat stable closing thoughts the game got rated 1010 and 910 by most major news outlets and i believe thats just objectively wrong if the cd project red logo was switched out for ea or ubisoft that game would be ripped apart by everyone in my opinion there is clear bias because of how good the witcher 3 was if any other company had released game in such bad shape there would be outrage by the outlets with talks about long term impacts and trust in the company not so in this case i have doubt that the bugs can and will be fixed in the future but even if the game was running perfectly its not better than 710

AspectosNegativos: ['Mundo abierto no inmersivo', 'Historia olvidable', 'Jugabilidad mejorable', 'Personalización de personajes deficiente', 'Sistema de crafting complicado y costoso', 'Bugs y problemas técnicos']

Contenido: good looking mess i love cyberpunk fiction the original blade runner is one of my favorite movies of all time and ive been always fan of the theming when i heard of this back in 2013 it looked like the best thing ever although even back then i had my doubts about the project it seemed too ambitiousi ended up getting this game on sale and while i had fun with it i got ta say that even at 50 off i cant recommend this mess and heres whythe goodfirst id like to mention what i enjoy the most about this game and that is the aesthetic the vehicles the interiors the stores the characters the clothing the different city districts i loved how unique they felt and how well they fit the genre the game looks great and the cyberpunk atmosphere is very well done thats what makes this somewhat unique and makes it stand out since the game such great looking visuals and places i spent lot of time taking screenshots and using the photo mode depending on where youre at the game looks phenomenal that was my favorite part of it using the photo mode and trying bunch of different style concepts managed to create some very nice wallpapers out of it the photo mode is very robust letting you switch from 1st to 3rd person move your character around bit and even pose for it i just wanted more focus related options and the ability to switch views during cutsceneanother great thing about this game is the character creator while its not the most complex ive ever seen it gets the job done and gives you good enough freedom to create good looking player or hideous monster for an open world game like this its great additionsome of the characters in the main story can be considered highlight i wish we could spend more time with them though outside of missionsthe progression system is also worth mentioning there are considerable amount of perks to buy lot of them are useless but it gives you somewhat of freedom enough to change some gameplay elements like the gunplay the stealth the hacking making specific missions easier and bit differentthe badok so despite having fun with the game i have to say why i cant recommend this mess the games all over the place it feels very rushed and like it an identity crisis thats where most of the problems are sometimes the game wants to be big open world sandbox other times it wants to be those very story driven scripted walking simulators for the first couple of hours you dont get the scope of how bad things are probably because the first few missions are heavily scripted even more than the usual because of that not many glitches occur to be honest the entire games scripted ass hell but the beginning is even worse like those theme park rides that are on rails the devs market the game as being this awesome rpg where you choices matters with bunch of different paths such bull they give you the illusion of choice when you start the story lifepaths but they literally dont matter youll just get different prologue and some random dialogue choices throughout the game that dont make any significant difference at all the games half dozen different endings but to get them only handful of choices youll make during the story will actually make any difference the plot its moments but i found it too linear for what they promised like i said some of the characters are great that was the only time i actually gave s about what was going on too bad you cant change anything other than the endingin reality its all smoke and mirrors at first it seems like the city is great and everything as you progress you get to see how shallow and pointless it all is the game doesnt have nearly enough variety to feel alive or make you come back to it you always see the same cars on the streets the same npc interaction and most of the side missions are very repetitive the apartments you buy offer absolutely nothing somethings you can only do at the starting one the cars you own you cant even change or choose colors so if you end up buying very cool car but it comes in brown or something boring theres way around it the character customization in terms of cyberware the implants you use to enhance your character is very limiting as well there are respectable variety of them and they do provide new gameplay features but they dont change anything in terms of looks for game that relies so much in aesthetic this is such wasted opportunity i wish we had more freedom in that department like the npcs with crazy implants and chrome i want thatand why the hell didnt they make 3rd person mode again for game that so much going on in terms of aesthetic and looks the only unique thing about this game they sure got lot of things wrong so you customize your character buy all these different clothes and the only time you get to see it is in the mirror or in the photo mode i cant wrap my mind around thatohh and the bug how can i forget them theyre everywhere there are all kinds of glitches visual ones like textures not loading blurry ads on buildings and some very weird ones like cars exploding out nowhere bunch of npcs reacting with the same looped animation right next to each other stupid pathfinding people floating npcs and vehicles clipping through objects talking corpses enemies with 0 health still fighting the list goes on and on those glitches are not rare occurrences they happen often and i have them all recorded fanboys like to claim they havent encountered any game breaking bugs and theyre not lying but dont be fooled while theyre not technically game breaking theyre very frequent and they come in all shapes and forms game thats been in development for such long time with such high expectations and they couldnt get the basics of an open world wowthe marketing campaign they made for this game was huge deception and the way they paid out early reviews was outright dirty the devs knew what they were doing and they chose to release this rushed mess anyway we cant justify it by its current state which is still far cry from what it was advertised as this game deserves all the hate it got and matter how great they turn this game in the future it wont erase its tainted story and all the people they deceived into preordering this joke nasty things like this in the gaming industry are becoming common and we cant allow this type of behavior cyberpunks plot is all about not trusting big corporations well i guess they got this part right
AspectosPositivos: ['Aesthetic', 'Character Creator', 'Some characters in the main story', 'Progression system']
AspectosNegativos: ['Rushed development', 'Identity crisis', 'Limited choices impact', 'Repetitive side missions', 'Lack of variety', 'Glitches and bugs', 'Deceptive marketing']

Contenido: 21 enero probably my most anticipated game of 2022 and when i first started the game up and entered the lands between i was in gamer heaven an open world dark souls game whats not to like well after almost completing the game my thoughts are this game is really bad overall im going to start with the goodthe combat and movement and other stuff regarding the player really an improvement form dark souls 3 but downgrade from sekiro not that it had to be exactly like sekiro but blend of dark souls 3 and sekrio would have been nice not the case its basically dark souls 3 with smoother response times and jump which is really nice addition other aspects of the game design i liked was the crafting and the horse awesome additions especially with the open worldgraphicslove the visuals of this game and the boss designs are amazing basically perfect not photo realistic obviously i told myself when i first bought the game id go down to the coast and check out the cliffs i did and was blown away at the shear size of them really set the tone at an eleven the rest of the game does not hold up to these first impressions but man was i excited at the early stages there are allot of massive too scale environments that youll be blown away by at first and then later ton of stuff is not scaled correctly thats all the good i can think of theres the obvious like voice acting and music but those are givens with fromsofts games at this point my favorite npc was the blacksmith really liked whoever did his voice acting all of them are good thoughthe bad the pacingthe pacing is terrible in this game its given that when making an open world experience your going to have grindingover leveling problem but all of fromsofts games have this problem to some extent and none of them allow to basically one shot bosses in later areas of the game it feels terrible and basically ruins the dance that was ds3 and sekiros combat why even make the move sets complex and varied at this point and its not hard to over level i wasnt even trying and i ended killing bosses that looked cool for about two seconds before they died and then the other side of things you have bosses that are overly difficult in that they one shot you instead and i could stomach one shot boss as long as it was fun but this leads into my second problemboss move sets the bosses in this game for the most part are bad they look cool except for the stone dogcat those are just lazy filler boss design the two types of bosses are basically mini bosses which get rehashed over and over again or major bosses that range from good to downright awful an example of good fight would be margot and godrick these bosses are challenging and while i have my issues with them theyre really solid overall pretty much every boss after these two are terrible and im only counting the major bosses that arent duplicated into oblivion radahn was the best out of these but his stupid design ruined it like what is that thing hes riding it looks so dumb it ruined his otherwise decent fight i honestly was laughing at him the whole time and when does the meteor attack your telling took his half starved mangled horse with him really wanted to like that fight another disappointing fight was rennala the build up is there the boss room is really cool and then woosh your out in ankle deep lake and her main attack is summoning enemies youve fought before as ghosts what about malekath which becomes sit there watching him jump around and then run up and hit him when stops moving repeat i really wanted to like these bosses but couldnt considering what we had before like gael pontiff the lothric princes the great ape and genichiro those bosses are in another league compared to elden ring nothing in elden ring comes close and i havent even talked about the duplicate bosses in depth all you need to know is that at the end of every cave every dungeon is just another mini boss that youve fought before like the god skin apostles god help those two are by far the single worst thing that exists in this game besides the stone guard dogs handful mini bosses are only duplicated few times but are so easy they dont justify even existing as boss fight but i played through dark souls 2 and that game the worst boss move sets by far out of the souls series so why did i like that game more then elden ring because elden ring does something i never thought id see from fromsoft under scaling levels like villages even castles i was expecting handcrafted world not repeat villages dungeons and caves with the same bear or guard dog or wolf mini boss at the end the best way to put it is everything is front it looks good from distance but as you get closer the realization hits you theres substance under this epic looking coastline or this larger then life high wall that makes up the capital city dark souls had massive interconnected worlds with levels like the undead village lothric castle in its entirety those where to scale compared to elden rings far smaller far emptier level design populated by you guessed it duplicate bosses my most disappointing moment was when i found the lobster shack i was thinking how cool itd be if i could go inside and there would be an npc i could talk to maybe sight of grace to sit at next to fireplace maybe kitchen with pot in the corner i could loot some lobsters from nope prop house that ive seen bunch of times already depth under scaled the beginning of the game felt allot better in this regard but i think its because everything was fresh and new i think if the game was more purposeful not linear really just everything was placed and created for reason outside of house is needed here or mini boss is needed here so lets just select one from our arsenal and pop it in there yeah lets just throw stone guard dog in that boss room that literally looks exactly the same as all the rest i dont know on one hand the game is one of kind and really gave feeling of what perfect game could be and on the other its painful experience that i wish i never played if you can forgive the lazy level design and the mostly mediocre bossesmaybe you wont mind this game you might even enjoy it but coming off of sekiro and ds3 this is just bad gamejust play those if you havent already anyways if i had to settle on score itd be 510 on average 310 at its worst and 810 for the first tenfifteen hours or so of the game
AspectosPositivos: ['Combate y movimiento', 'Diseño de jefes', 'Gráficos']
AspectosNegativos: ['Pacing', 'Diseño de niveles repetitivo', 'Diseño de jefes mediocres']

Contenido: heres an interesting ordeal about elden ring the souls formula its very much there entertaining gameplay very much there cool bosses very much there unfortunately for title that really does have all the potential to be the game of the halfdecade it falls short in the qa testing and qol department how let give you list of reasonsfor some reason fromsoft decided that certain things such as having check thatll have the game basically insult you for not closing it correctly was more important than fixing crashes guess what causes that check that makes the game insult you for not closing it correctly crashes guess what elden ring likes to do crashcrashing can also corrupt your savefile and if youre not lucky enough that steam made cloud backup youre permanently screwed over and have to restart from scratch say goodbye to your 100 hour characterdid you know that players can place message at the bottom of ladder and grief you by making it next to impossible to climb they can do that same thing for the top of the ladder i certainly hope you didnt fall down pit in certain mine and were scrambling to try and find way up while giant iron maiden with saws for hands was trying to murder you because youll get to it be unable to climb it and pressing the interact button will just bring up message from some moron that reads try fingers but hole as the giant 10 fullmetal killing machine grabs you from behind and kills you instantly why did they not pick up on this in qa testing again oh by the way youll find this at nearly every ladder where something will be trying to kill you while youre climbing it because people are moronsfall damage is terminally inconsistent there are sections where you can fall ten stories and survive without scratch like in some towers there are others where youll jump off five foot high drop freeze then die upon hitting the groundstutters i run this on computer that could theoretically be taken from nasas server farm and i still get random times where itll freeze for five seconds or drop to 15 frames for several seconds guess when this likes to happen during boss fights and times where things are trying to murder mewere you victim of dark bead mage twinking in ds3 guess what they didnt solve twinking you better be ready to get invaded by glass cannons thatve dedicated their entire build to int for using moonveil or str and arc in order to wield the pair of swords that create an instakilling gravity nuke that an aoe the size of debate hall are you not ready for them guess youre never playing multiplayer then because theyre the most common invader types youll run into and theyre literally everywherelooking for build variety in pvp sorry everyones either using bleed proc weapons or the gravity nuke swords you will occasionally find person with normal build otherwise its going to be pain and suffering all the way down theyre using bleed proc because bleed proc is one of the few ways to compensate for boss absurdity by the wayif youre cooping with buddies whatsoever youre agreeing to being invaded and as you may see from the they didnt fix twinking up above take my advice you should get to the next boss fight fast because every second you linger is second closer to another glass cannon invading and oneshotting you and your friendsthe grind to level up is horrendous after you clear level 30 hope youre alright with having to farm in excess of 10000 runes for single level and losing all of them to an invader or an enemy or boss you werent ready for by the way theres guy in certain castle thatll just straight up steal massive chunk of your runes every time you die and you have to kill him to make it stop does the game tell you this soeven if you get them back youre losing progress also hes apparently bugged to the point where his rune stealing will happen anywhere you die on the map have fun with thatalso on the topic of the grind looking to play legitimately sucks to be you pal youre going to be getting invaded by glass cannons twinks and people who are nonstop running rune farms left right and centerwhich means youll have to run rune farms to stay competitive which means youll be spending more time farming than actually playing the gameexpecting bosses that have attack patterns that make sense sorry one of the first ones you fight is literally twelve foot tall guy with superheavy attacks that moves like ballerina and wont stop out or hesitating on his attacks which makes learning his patterns infuriatingly difficult this will happen lotthere are multiple spots in the world where youll just be minding your business and fromsoft will happily drop an enemy far beyond your level and equipment rating atop you as bossget ready for lot of its about skill not gear while youre fighting enemies with an instantly casting hitscan spell that drives your character to madness and kills them instantly also get ready for deathblight thing that exists solely to kill you instantly and all the people running deathblight invasion builds for this exact reasonreally people are incredibly fond of saying skill issue when fromsoft casually drops what is effectively an ancient deity of chaos and madness on you in the overworld when youre sixty levels below where you should be to fight itby the way on the topic of that skill issue heavily upgraded regular sword can take upwards of 50 successful hits to kill the first major boss while slightly upgraded katana can do it in around ten swings and two bleed procs still about skill it never was equip bleed and watch quarter of the health of boss or 34ths the health of pvp invader vanish once that procsits great game with plenty of merit clearly it something to it because ive played 43 hours at the moment of writing this review and im still coming back but the problem is that there is so much rough around the edges missed bugfixing worn spots that need polish and rust that needs to be buffered out which fromsoft have either accidentally or willfully overlooked maybe youll take it like everybody else and say its your game of the year i have to disagree im having fun playing it but that fun is directly tied to whether or not and my friends can go 30 seconds without being invaded by another moonveil twink who found the most optimal route to instantly kill three people with one use of its special attack the second they exit bonfire range

AspectosNegativos: ['Problemas de QA y QoL', 'Crashes frecuentes', 'Corrupción de archivos de guardado', 'Inconsistencia en daño por caída', 'Problemas de rendimiento', 'Presencia de twinks y desbalance en PvP', 'Grind excesivo para subir de nivel', 'Problemas de diseño de enemigos y bosses']

Contenido: ill start off by saying this that this is good game its definitely not how some people describe it to be people that think its the endallbeall of games but its not bad however i do have some things i want to say about it some good and some bad also spoilers if you care about that1i think that the ability to get extremely far in terms of flasksgeneral items and areas located is amazing you dont even have to beat single boss and youd be able to make it extremely far in the game you can get good number of healing flasks and make those flasks heal good chunk of health before you even go past the first choke point area stormveil castle2a lot of weapons and lot of good weapons however one problem i have with this game and the dark souls games specifically dark souls 3 idea about 1 or 2 is that some weapons are very cool to use however by the time youre in late game theyre obsolete because of bad scaling yes you can make them scale better with specific stats however certain special weapons can anot be buffed with incantations to be fair some dont need to be and bnot be infused with new ashes so theyre never able to scale better with 1 stat over the other for instance the dragon kings cragblade is really cool weapon that i really like but it b scaling in dex at the highest now another weapon like the bloodhounds fang is also only b scaling in dex at highest but it can be infused with incantations whereas the cragblade can not meaning its damage ultimate becomes lacking against most enemies it does have 1530 damage bonus to ancient dragons and dragons respectively and the cragblade at 10 base damage of 225 whereas bloodhound fang at 10 is base damage of 345 along with having bleed buildup and better strength scaling than the cragblade cragblade 10 is d for strength and bloodhound fang 10 is c for strength meaning if youre using strength for bestial incantations you can also use bloodhound fang and get bit of extra damage3the bosses are fairly fun to fight up till certain point because late game main story bosses deal an absurd amount of damage when wearing fairly tanky armor crucible axe set taking my main character with 60 vigor i do not have the scarseal or the scorpions on down to around half health with some of their most basic attacks otherwise i think the bosses are good because the fight for lot of bosses is fairly fun bosses like placidusax astel naturalborn and in my opinion most dragon enemies are all fairly fun fights however it is downright criminal the runback for placidusaxs bossfight my god also ill say that gank fights are terrible in this game the valiant gargoyles could be removed from the game and id be more happy than anything else4the areas in this game are fairly well designed and the world isnt filled with stuff but you wont be travelling for too long before finding something else potentially stumbling upon an npc for unique questline or nice little tomb to get spirit ash i wont use cause i have tichemimic19 i think there are some parts of the map that they could have put something more maybe another merchant here or hidden little dungeon there but otherwise the map doesnt feel empty just sometimes it feels lonely5magic is pretty good in this game id say one of the better magic systems ive encountered in game the weapon buffs are fun to use and lot of spells either feel satisfying to use or are just good for clearing out enemies so you like it however i will say that it lacks variety in some departments though ill say i dislike how they basically merged pyromancy and miracles from dark souls to make incantations but its not too big of deal but otherwise for instance you have some types of incantations dragon communioncult tht have around 1312 each respectively and the erdtree incantations with 13 if you combine fire giant and fire monk 13 and then 15 for 2 finger incantations you have quite lot for each however the servants of rot incantations are only numbered as 4 and blood incantations as 4 im not asking to have just arbitrary things fit into having like 15 different rot incantations but for instance you could have an upgrade to pest threads that inflict scarlet rot as debuff or weapon buff to inflict rot since they have poison armament also make the scarlet aeonia not take like 8 seconds to be able to roll away from since even though its really cool its useless in some bossfights compared to either rot dragon heads and the sorceries im fine with there only being like 3 primeval sorceries because theyre supposed to be ancient ones that came before all others makes sense only few of them however i wish that there were some more of the aberrant sorceries for instance or the gravity sorceries for exampleall in all i think this is good game however i dont think people who have been playing fromsoft games for while compare this to something like dark souls its not and its very different from dark souls bosses in dark souls didnt have delayed attacks that were as much as some bosses in elden ring dark souls bosses did have delayed attacks but enough for the player to be able to notice and then dodge and not like in elden ring where you notice and got ta get up and go make sandwich before you come back and dodge and the aspect of the world is very different because dark souls 3 was very linear sure you had some paths you could go on the side for but ultimately you end up on the same path within an hour not like in elden ring where you have the entirety of the haligtree to explore the underground cave areas and most areas that you wouldnt think are optional really are you dont got ta step foot in caelid you can just not use the lift and go the other route and fight the magma wyrm because the world blends fairly nicely sure you end up on the path to the end again but unlike dark souls 3 its not just go hereherehere and youre done and if you cant beat boss then git gud in elden ring its more about you can go herebut theres also here unlocked to you to go to insteadi give elden ring an 8510 its good game its flaws namely in the weaponshow stats work but ultimately is for set of players that enjoy difficult games with refined combat soulslike games with exploration and open worldsi probably have some things i overlooked but if i remember to i might redo this review if and when i remember some things i forgot or overlooked
AspectosPositivos: ['Posibilidad de avanzar lejos sin necesidad de vencer a un jefe', 'Variedad de armas', 'Diseño de áreas', 'Sistema de magia']
AspectosNegativos: ['Obsolescencia de algunas armas en late game', 'Daño excesivo de jefes en late game', 'Corrida hacia jefes específicos', 'Combates grupales (gank fights)']

Contenido: for the first time i am doing revised review for game originally i had given this game negative review because i felt the cons outweighed the pros but after patch 103 and continuing to play the game i feel elden ring deserves revised review which i will be giving it positive score however i do have plenty of cons to mention regardlessgraphicsgame is breathtaking to look at so many moments of wanting to take screenshot and enjoy the scenery of it all even the worst of places in elden ring still looks great and the visuals are top notch out of all the from software games they really made this game incredible on the eyes absolutely jaw dropping to say the leastgameplaysoul games have always been linear and well designed so i was afraid of how from software would handle an open world got ta say they did very excellent job you can pretty much almost go anywhere youd like with few exceptions and elden ring took all previous games before it and placed them all into this one the best traits anyways so much variety of builds to go with lot of ways to fight ashes of war are incredible since they truly spice up combat and the fact you can fight while on horseback is so fun overall also every part of the world is filled with something not single place is empty so many secrets discoveries unique bosses and hidden lore that it is brimming im very impressed to say the leastalso which ever employee came up with spirit summons give them raise theyre super fun concept and the best solution if you somehow cant or unwilling to play online fantastic concept and well executed for suredifficultyits souls like it is going to be hard while i would even say elden ring is the hardest souls yet the devs have given people so many ways in approaching fight the game rewards players for exploring getting stronger finding better weapons or loot and coming back to boss to overcome it while some builds are far superior depending on what you optimize every build is good enough and so long as youre experienced and patient the game can be beaten even with lvl 1 character its all about how you go about fight and learn from your mistakesnpcs and questsperhaps the most depth of any previous souls game as well since theres so many npcs to interact with telling story having quests and these ones actually move around the world which impacts the story some will be more of fan favorite than others but each npc is well written and i definitely loved their dynamics including the fact some outright help you in fights you would of otherwise struggled with doing and completing their quest lines not only rewards you with loot but can even lead to changes and some secrets that wouldnt be possible otherwiseconsso despite elden ring is very good game great even there are lot of issues i have with the game even after patch 103 which fixed or improved the problems i had beforehandvaguenessto explain the game gives little to hints on how to progress certain npc quests what theyll do next where to go at times apart from main mandatory bosses key items very essential items and so forth i understand souls games in the past have held back secrets but because they were linear it was easy to check every corner and not miss too much here the game is open world and the devs went out of their way to hide lot of stuff to the point you will need guide or go into ng while i get they want you to replay their game and invest it isnt properly executed i know fans will say it rewards players for discovering stuff on their own but the fact theres quest markers completion entries or anything to let you know whos gone where it takes out of the game by lot since i hate missing stuffmultiplayerso this is big one i cant seem to coop with friends much at all i can help strangers but if i use password game often disconnects or downright crashes then you have people who are cheating often in pvp using the most meta stuff that makes you die instantly bleed builds and honestly it doesnt feel like the devs balanced it well at all the game is amazing in pve but pvp very unstable and not exactly good only plus side is helping those struggling with boss but thats if the game lets do so other game in my library this issue with doing multiplayercrashes and stuttersgame will at times crash or stutter hard it is at random and nothing fixes it i am not too upset due to the fact it isnt often but when it does happen it is quite terrible to experience my graphics card is up to date newer version and again other game in my library besides infamous skyrim this problem i personally think they need to do more patches to fix this since so many are facing this issue stillmetathis game is obsessed with certain builds as theyre very strong and can make the fight trivial even if you do bleed build or hyper magic build you will destroy both pve and pvp if you do strength build you are hindering yourself sadly as so many enemies are fast hit harder and can tank against your heavy hits also some ashes of war are outright broken also the meta for this game is very off putting rather than earning your stuff you can easily run around collecting upgrades and get your weapon to 9 or even 10 before killing single boss i know you dont have to do this but knowing its possible makes wonder why handicap myself and struggle when i can just be overpowered off the start id rather struggle and be forced to like previous games even if there was cheeselike methods this game too many opportunities to make you feel you need to be meta to just keep up in pve and pvpconclusiongame is great very good i would say lot of downsides with mostly it hiding important information and key items from you forcing you to scout and possibly become overpowered to just win early not exactly the best but for those who like to do whatever it does benefit those people since they can just get to level 45 10 weapon before fighting the first boss after the tutorial boss games balance is questionable and lot of issues with multiplayer with meta and disconnections crashes but otherwise game is very fun engaging so much content awesome bosses and so much variety to the builds if you dont want to be meta i am giving this positive score but it was close to still being negative like the first review i didstill hoping dlc comes out for this game im waiting with baited breath
AspectosPositivos: ['Breathtaking graphics', 'Open world design', 'Variety of builds', 'Spirit summons concept', 'Depth of NPCs and quests']
AspectosNegativos: ['Vagueness in progression hints', 'Issues with multiplayer connectivity and balance', 'Crashes and stutters', 'Obsession with certain overpowered builds']

Contenido: ill preface this by saying the game is great for an rpg it the difficulty and mechanics of souls game with immense world building and great story boss design however this game been so heavily praised that everyone is turning blind eye to the very apparent issues that plague not only this game but many fromsoft games in general its sad that after numerous titles these issues still go unaddressed and at the time of editing this review nearly year after the initial release the aforementioned bugs still havent been fixedrepetitivenesselden ring an expansive openworld map that the player can traverse across without any sense of linearity however there are not nearly enough unique enemies to justify such large map what were left with are numerous caverns and dungeons with literal copy paste bosses or slight variants many times over other games do this but not to the extent that elden ring doesjust discovered dungeon and beat the watchdog at the end of it expect to face that exact same boss another 4 times throughout the game on top of this the devs somehow think more is better as if ds2 wasnt heavily criticized for its disgusting spam of enemies if you explore dungeon in late game area where they want to reuse one of the previous field bosses have fun dealing with 2 or sometimes even 34 instances of that same boss this is most egregious when you go to ashen capital and encounter three ulcerated tree spirits all stuck in the same sand pit guarding single talismanits to be expected that with 51 caves and dungeons some boss designs will be reused however literally copy pasting the same enemy and then sometimes adding another 1 or 2 of it to up the difficulty is lazy if you have to do this to fill in the empty space the map shouldnt have been this big to begin withpvpthe pvp in this game feels quite good apart from the atrocious network connections however the devs have taken back step away from balancing weapons with pvp in mind what youre left with is game where only some weapons are viable while others are nearly unusable this was especially apparent on release where every other pvp match was person using the same 2 weapons to gank their way to victory the devs have since nerfed them however this still leaves plenty of others that are either too strong or not usable this is what happens when pvp isnt the main focus and the devs just dont care enough to try and fix it at the risk of changing the balance of pvefor example bloodhound step is so stupidly broken in pvp due to its low cost and infinite iframes its great to use in pve but completely ruins pvp there are many more instances of thisand this isnt even getting into the unaddressed problems with the world map and pvp such as afk farming where host gets to an unreachable spot with horse only to then use taunters tongue to bring people to their world and bm or go afk to farm runes due to invaders having to leave in order to continue playing the gameits apparent the devs just dont care that much that they added it so they could check it off list despite invasions being core mechanic for every souls game by fromsoftbugsloading screens just freeze explanation as to why or what the cause may be it just randomly happens and requires altf4 to fixpc still performance issues with shaders for many players including myself despite said players more than meeting the minimum requirements they supposedly posted an update month or two after release that was supposed to fix this however it not changed it in the slightest for im stuck playing the game at whopping 2030 fps in most areas even though im running gtx1080 mouse cursor constantly leaves the monitor if youre using more than 1 monitor which happens after you exit ui you have to deliberately click on the screen after exiting the ui in order to refocus the game i have never had this issue with any other game before only elden ringkeybindings are trash and its enraging they still treat pc players like 2nd rate users after decades of development on souls games this is the 7th souls game and they still produce subpar controls for pc its just downright insulting for aaa studio to be doing this and people who can only respond with well dont play on kbm its supposed to be played with controller only further prove my point if youre going to have support for it dont half ass it if the only excuse people can give is well dont use that feature then that feature is not good all ui prompts are defaulted to controller meaning when you first start playing the game you have way of knowing what keybinds are what hell it took 30 minutes of guessing what keys to press and having to alt f4 when getting stuck in some menu due to not knowing what the back button is to finally navigate to the keybindings menu to change and save to my own preferences i mean seriously the default key binds for ui dont even make sense instead of having the primary or secondary keybinds for navigating back in ui menus be escape backspace or even delete they chose q mappings for specific actions are forcibly grouped together meaning you can not have separate inputs eg sprint roll and back step have to come from the same key this would be fine if they were in different contexts but they arent youre forced to abide by the small amount of options that come from using controller despite not actually using controller inputs are noticeably delayed ingame id wager this is due to the game being designed around controller gameplay requiring it to delay the action in order to check for additional inputs for combined keybinds or double clicking another example of fromsoft just not giving any attention or care to their pc audience on top of the previous complaints they hardcoded specific keys which can not be changed from the keybindings menu just why it isnt even cherry picking all ui keys are hardcoded meaning im stuck with the default q for navigating backwards again lazyin conclusionelden ring is the perfect example of game whose devs could not keep up with the designers the result when you take great world design engaging combat and incredibly unique story bosses while simultaneously cutting corners in almost every aspect in order to meet the massive scale of the game is the game good yea its really fun are there tons of hours worth of play time definitelyis it perfect absolutely not
AspectosPositivos: ['World building', 'Story boss design']
AspectosNegativos: ['Repetitiveness', 'Lack of unique enemies', 'Unbalanced PvP', 'Performance issues on PC']

Contenido: cyberpunk 2077 reviewlate into 2020 we finally get to see the release of one of the most anticipated games of the year and needless to say the bumps in the road have left their mark on cyberpunks wheels the story takes place in vibrant and beautiful futuristic world that regrettably lacks the substance to take advantage of its setting and leaves something more to be desired keep reading to find out whyproscons vibrant world in neon lights good use of suspense in the story attributes play in interesting ways keanu reeves we all love keanu right soundtrack in gunfights is sweet perk system is boring convoluted questlines suffers from technical problems gunplay is clunky and shameful detective bits give bad pacing wake the f up samurai we have game to burn cyberpunk is one of the games that had hyped up for its release i fell in love with cd project red after playing the witcher 3 in console way back and i was sorely disappointed in the result of this title the vibrant world it presents and shows us with amazing reflections and lights illuminating the city giving life to it is brought down by the gameplay and the way the systems are designedto illustrate this the perk system is based on bonuses such as deal 10 more damage with light machine guns or reload 5 faster and those are boring upgrades to attain while playing we as players want to do crazy stuff meaningful stuff and to see most upgrades just be bonuses leaves feeling of desiring something more i would have preferred being able to soak up the damage by using steel arm or slowing time in gunfights rather than the skills we got while there are mechanical upgrades these tend to be few and are insignificant as well half the timehttpssteamcommunitycomsharedfilesfiledetailsid2325343689gunplay is also sort of clunky giving sensation of being dull and slow while integrating numbers into the mix that adds more into an already heavily packed hud you aim and shoot while getting to cover and playing titanfall 2 recently shown that you can make shooting gun very fun there is not enough movement during combat to feed the trigger and make those explosive situations actionpacked and memorable it behaves more like classic rpg rather than true shooter in that regard can not teach an old dog new tricks lot of the issues that cyberpunk suffers from have been seen in the witcher 3 years ago and yet cd project red keeps committing the same mistakes granted is an open world so is bound to have glitches and such but the number of issues you can find here can give you such migrainelike in my case after losing all my progress 10 hours into the gamethe story can be interesting at points as they use suspense to make you play more to find out what happens next and during the first few hours it can pull you in with fantastic storyline job then it ruins it by introducing to you way too many characters for you to be able to bond with any of them go here and obey go here and work with b go here and listen to c and up to the letter z it must be painful for v to have to remember all those people right it convolutes the plot by adding too many subplots and characters into the foldhttpssteamcommunitycomsharedfilesfiledetailsid2325342571but keanu reeves is in it how it could be bad sadly the famous voice actor does not equal good performance and before you start dragging to pyre do not get wrong keanu is fantastic but you know who isnt fantastic johnny silverhand the way keanu portraits the character comes off as stiff when compared to the rest of the cast and it just does not cut in the convincing department silverhand is also problem because it diminishes your character presence in the main story while also adding deuteragonist that is not very interesting strong and weak pointsthe strong point of cyberpunk is how beautiful and vibrant the world is the neon lights shining on the dark streets while in the daylight everything feels compacted like maze that makes you want to explore it the characters look great and so do lot of the aesthetics and designs you will find during your playthrough also the music is spectacular during gunfights featuring badassfuturistic vibe to it that adds more to the encounters you will havehttpssteamcommunitycomsharedfilesfiledetailsid2325341173the weak point is that those elements are downplayed because there is flavor to them the perk system is pretty standard and boring the main story can be interesting at times and then have you yawn at others and the gameplay itself feels inferior to games that have been released years ago just so you know is not about titanfall 2 lot of shooters do have better gunplay than this the glitches range from partial nudity to going through walls to losing save data to objects disappearing items descriptions getting stuck in the hud and that is only the tip of the iceberg that is cyberpunk messy releasex notesit was tested on an rtx 2070 s i found it to be very annoying that when quest asks the player to unequip items or equip other items which happens more than what i would like to one to reequip all of it again couple of times it could be ok but 7 times is bothersome the more i played this particular title the less interesting it became for and i truly wanted to love cyberpunk but i am just disappointedthe detective bits were cool the first few times but after that they became tedious they basically sum up as rewind here now rewind there rewind here again and thats it they do not make you feel like detective or something and rather is just point click to which you already have all the answers to finallyif you read this far you probably must be thinking that i hate cyberpunk i do not but i would be lying if i said i think it is masterpiece or something the game is not bad but is not amazing either so is more along the ok lines which is why i would give it positive rating exceptthat in this case we should not settle for mediocrity it was supposed to be the game and ended up being something standard something that failed to deliver and that ended up being letdown get the game if you want to jump on the bandwagon but otherwise wait until they patch more stuff and keep in mind is not that action oriented if you like this review give it thumbs up if you want to add your own opinion or share something informative do it below in the comments
AspectosPositivos: ['Vibrant world in neon lights', 'Good use of suspense in the story', 'Attributes play in interesting ways']
AspectosNegativos: ['Perk system is boring', 'Convoluted questlines', 'Suffers from technical problems', 'Gunplay is clunky and shameful', 'Detective bits give bad pacing']

Contenido: cyberpunk 2077 reviewlate into 2020 we finally get to see the release of one of the most anticipated games of the year and needless to say the bumps in the road have left their mark on cyberpunks wheels the story takes place in vibrant and beautiful futuristic world that regrettably lacks the substance to take advantage of its setting and leaves something more to be desired keep reading to find out whyproscons vibrant world in neon lights good use of suspense in the story attributes play in interesting ways keanu reeves we all love keanu right soundtrack in gunfights is sweet perk system is boring convoluted questlines suffers from technical problems gunplay is clunky and shameful detective bits give bad pacing wake the f up samurai we have game to burn cyberpunk is one of the games that had hyped up for its release i fell in love with cd project red after playing the witcher 3 in console way back and i was sorely disappointed in the result of this title the vibrant world it presents and shows us with amazing reflections and lights illuminating the city giving life to it is brought down by the gameplay and the way the systems are designedto illustrate this the perk system is based on bonuses such as deal 10 more damage with light machine guns or reload 5 faster and those are boring upgrades to attain while playing we as players want to do crazy stuff meaningful stuff and to see most upgrades just be bonuses leaves feeling of desiring something more i would have preferred being able to soak up the damage by using steel arm or slowing time in gunfights rather than the skills we got while there are mechanical upgrades these tend to be few and are insignificant as well half the timehttpssteamcommunitycomsharedfilesfiledetailsid2325343689gunplay is also sort of clunky giving sensation of being dull and slow while integrating numbers into the mix that adds more into an already heavily packed hud you aim and shoot while getting to cover and playing titanfall 2 recently shown that you can make shooting gun very fun there is not enough movement during combat to feed the trigger and make those explosive situations actionpacked and memorable it behaves more like classic rpg rather than true shooter in that regard can not teach an old dog new tricks lot of the issues that cyberpunk suffers from have been seen in the witcher 3 years ago and yet cd project red keeps committing the same mistakes granted is an open world so is bound to have glitches and such but the number of issues you can find here can give you such migrainelike in my case after losing all my progress 10 hours into the gamethe story can be interesting at points as they use suspense to make you play more to find out what happens next and during the first few hours it can pull you in with fantastic storyline job then it ruins it by introducing to you way too many characters for you to be able to bond with any of them go here and obey go here and work with b go here and listen to c and up to the letter z it must be painful for v to have to remember all those people right it convolutes the plot by adding too many subplots and characters into the foldhttpssteamcommunitycomsharedfilesfiledetailsid2325342571but keanu reeves is in it how it could be bad sadly the famous voice actor does not equal good performance and before you start dragging to pyre do not get wrong keanu is fantastic but you know who isnt fantastic johnny silverhand the way keanu portraits the character comes off as stiff when compared to the rest of the cast and it just does not cut in the convincing department silverhand is also problem because it diminishes your character presence in the main story while also adding deuteragonist that is not very interesting strong and weak pointsthe strong point of cyberpunk is how beautiful and vibrant the world is the neon lights shining on the dark streets while in the daylight everything feels compacted like maze that makes you want to explore it the characters look great and so do lot of the aesthetics and designs you will find during your playthrough also the music is spectacular during gunfights featuring badassfuturistic vibe to it that adds more to the encounters you will havehttpssteamcommunitycomsharedfilesfiledetailsid2325341173the weak point is that those elements are downplayed because there is flavor to them the perk system is pretty standard and boring the main story can be interesting at times and then have you yawn at others and the gameplay itself feels inferior to games that have been released years ago just so you know is not about titanfall 2 lot of shooters do have better gunplay than this the glitches range from partial nudity to going through walls to losing save data to objects disappearing items descriptions getting stuck in the hud and that is only the tip of the iceberg that is cyberpunk messy releasex notesit was tested on an rtx 2070 s i found it to be very annoying that when quest asks the player to unequip items or equip other items which happens more than what i would like to one to reequip all of it again couple of times it could be ok but 7 times is bothersome the more i played this particular title the less interesting it became for and i truly wanted to love cyberpunk but i am just disappointedthe detective bits were cool the first few times but after that they became tedious they basically sum up as rewind here now rewind there rewind here again and thats it they do not make you feel like detective or something and rather is just point click to which you already have all the answers to finallyif you read this far you probably must be thinking that i hate cyberpunk i do not but i would be lying if i said i think it is masterpiece or something the game is not bad but is not amazing either so is more along the ok lines which is why i would give it positive rating exceptthat in this case we should not settle for mediocrity it was supposed to be the game and ended up being something standard something that failed to deliver and that ended up being letdown get the game if you want to jump on the bandwagon but otherwise wait until they patch more stuff and keep in mind is not that action oriented if you like this review give it thumbs up if you want to add your own opinion or share something informative do it below in the comments
